      • addHighscore

        public boolean addHighscore(java.lang.String name,
                            int numberOfRounds,
                            int roundsWon,
                            int bananasThrown)
        Adds new highscore-entry.
        Parameters:
        name - name of player
        numberOfRounds - amount of rounds
        roundsWon - amount of wins
        bananasThrown - thrown bananas
        Returns:
        Returns true if no sort was made - False if highscore had to be re-sorted

      • sortHighscore

        private boolean sortHighscore()
        Sorting highscore with a simple sorting algorithm. Basically empties our highscore matrix and re-adds every element single which then results in a sorted matrix.
        Returns:
        False since highscore was sorted
